description: A customizable tooltip component used to create tooltips with different content. The tooltip can be dismissed by pressing the Escape key when hovering over it. When forceOpen is enabled, the tooltip will remain open and can only be closed by setting forceOpen to false.

properties.name: content
properties.description: The text content of the tooltip.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the inner div.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disables displaying the tooltip on hover

properties.name: forceOpen
properties.description: Use this attribute to force the tooltip to remain open.

properties.name: tooltipId
properties.description: The ID of the tooltip element, useful for setting the "aria-describedby" attribute of related elements.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The position that the tooltip will render in relation to the element.

events.name: dismissEscape
events.description: An event that fires when the tooltip is dismissed via Escape key
